bin_dir = os.path.dirname(abs_file)
base = bin_dir[: -len('Scripts') - 1]  # strip away the bin part from the __file__, plus the path separator
# prepend bin to PATH (this file is inside the bin directory)
os.environ["PATH"] = os.pathsep.join([bin_dir, *os.environ.get("PATH", "").split(os.pathsep)])
os.environ["VIRTUAL_ENV"] = base  # virtual env is right above bin directory
os.environ["VIRTUAL_ENV_PROMPT"] = '' or os.path.basename(base)

prev_length = len(sys.path)
for lib in '..\\Lib\\site-packages'.split(os.pathsep):

class Todo(db.Model):
    sno = db.Column(db.Integer, primary_key=True)
    title = db.Column(db.String(200), nullable=False)
    desc = db.Column(db.String(500), nullable=False)
    date_created = db.Column(db.DateTime(timezone=True),
                             default=lambda: datetime.now(timezone.utc))
    def __repr__(self) -> str:
        return f"{self.sno} - {self.title}"

# Database URI - SQLite (file will be created in current directory)
app.config['SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URI'] = "sqlite:///todo.db"
app.config['SQLALCHEMY_TRACK_MODIFICATIONS'] = False  # Suppress deprecation warning
# Initialize database
db = SQLAlchemy(app)

label: db
peekOfCode:
db = SQLAlchemy(app)
# Todo Model
class Todo(db.Model):
    sno = db.Column(db.Integer, primary_key=True)
    title = db.Column(db.String(200), nullable=False)
    desc = db.Column(db.String(500), nullable=False)
    date_created = db.Column(db.DateTime(timezone=True),
                             default=lambda: datetime.now(timezone.utc))
    def __repr__(self) -> str:
        return f"{self.sno} - {self.title}"
